languages.text: "Ну, значит, по рукам? Меняемся поводками? Фон Валанциус получает сслита, а Винтерскейл — друкари. Посмотрим, как тебе пойдет пневмоошейник, ксенос..." {n}Каллигос с ухмылкой тянется к горлу Маражая.{/n}

"Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ну, значит, по рукам? Меняемся поводками? Фон Валанциус получает сслита, а Винтерскейл — друкари. Посмотрим, как тебе пойдет пневмоошейник, ксенос..." {n}Каллигос с ухмылкой тянется к горлу Маражая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So, we have a deal? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale — the Drukhari. We'll see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

"So, we have a deal? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale — the Drukhari. We'll see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

"So, we have a deal? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale — the Drukhari. We'll see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

"So, we have a deal? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale — the Drukhari. We'll see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

"Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

"Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Hay trato, pues? ¿Intercambiamos las correas? Von Valancius recibe al Sslyth, y Winterscale al Drukhari. Ya comprobaremos cómo te queda un neumocollar, xenos...». {n}Calligos extiende la mano para agarrar a Marazhai por el cuello.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Hay trato, pues? ¿Intercambiamos las correas? Von Valancius recibe al sslyth, y Winterscale al Drukhari. Ya comprobaremos cómo te queda un neumocollar, xenos...». {n}Calligos extiende la mano para agarrar a Marazhai por el cuello.{/n}

languages.text: “也就是说，成交了吗？那咱们来交换宠物吧？冯·瓦兰修斯会得到蛇人，而温特斯凯尔会得到黑暗灵族。咱们可以看看呼吸项圈到底适不适合你，异形……”{n}卡里戈斯咧嘴一笑，伸手去扯玛拉斋的脖子。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，成交了吗？那咱们来交换宠物吧？冯·瓦兰修斯会得到蛇人，而温特斯凯尔会得到黑暗灵族。咱们可以看看呼吸项圈到底适不适合你，异形……”{n}卡里戈斯咧嘴一笑，伸手去扯玛拉斋的脖子。{/n}

languages.text: « Un échange d'esclaves... Très bien, marché conclu. Von Valancius prend le Sslyth et Winterscale, le Drukhari. Voyons comment vous supportez le pneumocollier, xénos... » {n}Tout sourire, Calligos tend la main vers le cou de Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Un échange d'esclaves... Très bien, marché conclu. Von Valancius prend le Sslyth et Winterscale, le Drukhari. Voyons comment vous supportez le pneumocollier, xénos... » {n}Tout sourire, Calligos tend la main vers le cou de Marazhai.{/n}

languages.text: 「では、取引成立だな？鎖の交換か？フォン・ヴァランシウスがススリスを、ウィンタースケールがデュカーリを受け取る。ニューモ・カラーが似合うか見てみようじゃないか、異種族…」{n}カリゴスはニヤリと笑い、マラズハイの首に手を伸ばす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「では、取引成立だな？鎖の交換か？フォン・ヴァランシウスがススリスを、ウィンタースケールがデュカーリを受け取る。ニューモ・カラーが似合うか見てみようじゃないか、異種族…」{n}カリゴスはニヤリと笑い、マラズハイの首に手を伸ばす。{/n}

languages.text: "Also sind wir uns einig? Wir tauschen die Leinen? Von Valancius erhält den Sslyth und Winterzunder den Drukhari. Mal sehen, wie gut Euch ein Pneumo-Halsband passt, Xenos ..." {n}Mit einem Grinsen streckt Calligos die Hand nach Marazhais Hals aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Also, haben wir eine Einigung? Wir tauschen die Leinen? Von Valancius erhält den Sslyth und Winterzunder — den Drukhari. Mal sehen, wie gut Euch ein Pneumo-Halsband passt, Xenos ..." {n}Mit einem Grinsen streckt Calligos die Hand nach Marazhais Hals aus.{/n}

languages.text: "O hâlde anlaştık mı? Dizginleri değiştiriyor muyuz? Von Valancius Sslyth'i alacak, Winterscale de Drukhari'yi. Bakalım pnömo tasma sana ne kadar yakışacak zeno..." {n}Calligos, yüzünde bir sırıtışla Marazhai'ın boynuna uzanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Have we a deal, then? An exchange of leashes? Von Valancius receives the Sslyth, and Winterscale the Drukhari. Let's see how well a pneumo-collar fits you, xenos..." {n}With a grin, Calligos reaches for Marazhai's neck.{/n}
